page.title: 04Village Home Life
page.content: The home life of the residents of Cock Clarks and Purleigh varies depending on the age group, the sex and whether or not they've got children.There are not many young adults in the area compared with the elderly and the middle aged. The people with children tended to say that there was not enough going on for youngsters such as playing fields and youth clubs.However, the people without children thought more about the pavements, the bus services and the roads. Most people had solid fuel heating.Out of the seven people we interviewed, the women did the cooking and shared the gardening with their husbands. Everyone had at least one pet and owned a car.Everyone shopped at either Maldon or South Woodham Ferrers.
